dcterms:creator: A Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is a dataset used for evaluating online class-incremental learning methods, consisting of 100 classes with 600 images per class, split into 20 tasks with no overlapping classes.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Oriol Vinyals
Charles Blundell
Timothy Lillicrap
Daan Wierstra
dcterms:description: Mini-ImageNet is a dataset used for evaluating online class-incremental learning methods, containing 100 classes split into 20 disjoint tasks, with each class consisting of 500 training images and 100 test images.
dcterms:title: Mini-ImageNet

dcterms:creator: Ya Le
Xuan Yang
dcterms:description: Tiny-ImageNet is a dataset used for evaluating online class-incremental learning methods, consisting of 200 classes split into 20 disjoint tasks, with each class containing 500 training images and 100 test images.
dcterms:title: Tiny-ImageNet
